name: Creative Medical Technology Holdings, Inc.
description: Creative Medical Technology Holdings, Inc. is a biotechnology company focused on developing innovative stem cell-based therapies to treat various medical conditions. Founded in 2016, the company aims to harness the potential of regenerative medicine to provide solutions for unmet medical needs. CELZ specializes in the development of treatments for neurological disorders, orthopedic injuries, and chronic pain, utilizing its proprietary technology to extract and utilize stem cells from patients' own bodies. The company's flagship product, the CaverStem procedure, is designed to treat erectile dysfunction by utilizing the regenerative properties of stem cells. CELZ is committed to advancing the field of regenerative medicine through rigorous clinical research and development, with the goal of improving patient outcomes and quality of life. The company believes in the power of personalized medicine and aims to make advanced therapies accessible to patients worldwide. Creative Medical Technology Holdings is actively engaged in partnerships and collaborations to enhance its research capabilities and expand its product portfolio, striving to become a leader in the biotechnology sector.

key_executives.name: Dr. Michael T. M. G. D. P. M. H. H. P. B. K. S. S. R. K. R. H.

seo.meta_title: Creative Medical Technology Holdings, Inc. | Stem Cell-Based Therapies
seo.meta_description: Explore Creative Medical Technology Holdings, Inc., a leader in developing stem cell therapies for various medical conditions. Learn about our innovative technologies and commitment to regenerative medicine.

faq.question: What is Creative Medical Technology known for?
faq.answer: Creative Medical Technology is known for developing stem cell-based therapies for medical conditions, including erectile dysfunction and neurological disorders.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Creative Medical Technology?
faq.answer: Timothy Warbington is the CEO of Creative Medical Technology Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Creative Medical Technology headquartered?
faq.answer: Creative Medical Technology is headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, USA.

faq.question: What are Creative Medical Technology's main products?
faq.answer: Creative Medical Technology's main products include the CaverStem procedure and NeuroStem therapy.

faq.question: When was Creative Medical Technology founded?
faq.answer: Creative Medical Technology was founded in 2016.
